page.title: 02CLUBS IN WINGERWORTH
page.content:
In Wingerworth there are many{clubs} for all ages. They are:
{ Cricket Football Fishing {Tennis Bowls Over 60's {Scouts Guides Cubs { Brownies Keep Fit Ballet {Tap Dancing Church Y.C Womens { Institute {Play Group Youth Club Church {Groups The{Youth Club,}on Allendale Rd., is is for people aged 7-21 and different groups meet each night. For example there is a 'Girls 'Night',and a night for those aged 7-10. It is organised like this in order to cater for a wide range of interests. Unfortunately last week the club had to be closed for a few days because the outside of the building had been badly vandalised.
